documents-index.site-wide-notice: Upload documents to IPFS and sign them with your Ethereum address.
documents-index.dropzone-message:
Drag a document to upload

- or -

Browse

documents-sign.not-allowed: You are not allowed to view or sign this document because
documents-sign.unmatched-address: Your Ethereum address does not match the document creator address
documents-sign.unmatched-signers: Your Ethereum address does not match any of the signers addresses
documents-sign.is-document-creator: As the document creator, you already signed this document
documents-sign.create-record: You will create a new immutable record in this smart contract:
documents-sign.signed-in-tx: The document was signed in this transaction:

documents-request.invalid-hex-address: Address is not a valid HEX Ethereum address
documents-request.address-equals-creator: Address should not be equal to the document creator address
documents-request.address-equals-another-address: Address should not match another signer address
documents-request.invalid-email-address: Email is not a valid email address
documents-request.email-equals-creator-email: Email should not be equal to the document creator email
documents-request.email-equals-another-email: Email should not match another signer email
documents-request.at-least-1-signer: At least 1 signer needs to be added in order to request signatures
documents-request.add-notification-email: You need to add a notification email
documents-request.connected-to: You are connected to the {{ network }} Ethereum network using this Ethereum address: {{ address }}
documents-request.new-record: You will create a new record in this smart contract:
documents-request.signers-notified: The signers will be notified via email
documents-request.signers-must-match: Each signer address must match the signer address specified in this document
documents-request.published-in-tx: The document was published in this transaction
documents-request.signers-were-notified: An email notification was sent to the signers. You will be notified when all signers have signed the document.
